AppDB.Name: HBMC_ENABLE_DYNAMIC_MEMORY_ACCESS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: enable dynamic memory access to HBMC

AppDB.Name: HCC_ENABLE_DYNAMIC_MEMORY_ACCESS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: enable dynamic memory acces to HCC

AppDB.Name: TDU_COUNTERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Counters of write/read requests to/from DDP

Field.Description: Window size to calculate DRAM Block indication (common to all leaky buckets)
Field.Name: LEAKY_BUCKET_WINDOW_SIZE

AppDB.Name: TDU_DRAM_BLOCK_WRITE_MINUS_READ_LEAKY_BUCKET_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configures the write-minus-read leaky bucket for DRAM block

AppDB.Name: TDU_DRAM_BLOCK_WRITE_PLUS_READ_LEAKY_BUCKET_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configures the write-plus-read leaky bucket for DRAM block

AppDB.Name: TDU_DRAM_BLOCK_AVERAGE_READ_INFLIGHTS_LEAKY_BUCKET_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configures the average-read-inflights leaky bucket for DRAM block

AppDB.Name: HCC_HBM_CHANNEL_SOFT_RESET
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Reset entire block, including configuration registers
